title: Define System Requirements and Functionalities
description: Gather, document, and prioritize the necessary features and functionalities of the LegalExpertSystem.

title: Design the User Interface (UI)
description: Create wireframes and mockups for the LegalExpertSystem's frontend, ensuring it is user-friendly and intuitive.

title: Design the Backend Architecture
description: Develop a robust backend architecture to handle user inputs, legal databases, and the reasoning engine.

title: Establish Database Schema
description: Design the database schema for storing user inputs, legal cases, and system data.

title: Implement Data Models and Queries
description: Create data models and SQL queries to enable efficient interaction with the backend database.

title: Develop the Reasoning Engine Algorithm
description: Design and implement the algorithm that analyzes user inputs and provides preliminary legal advice based on case law.

title: Integrate User Interface with Backend
description: Connect the frontend to the backend for seamless interaction between the two.

title: Perform Unit Tests and Code Reviews
description: Review individual components of the LegalExpertSystem for functionality, performance, and security issues.

title: Write System Documentation
description: Document all components of the LegalExpertSystem, including architecture, design decisions, and usage guidelines.
